Detailed Description

Legacy tooling inherited from the Cube engine.

This file contains a collection of deprecated, standalone tooling that replicates some standard library functionality. It is highly recommended that the std library equivalents of these utilities are used in their place.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ ENUMERATE

#define ENUMERATE (   ht,
  t,
  e,
  b 
)
Value:
for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
{ \
for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
{ \
t &e = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
b; \
} \
}

◆ ENUMERATE_KT

#define ENUMERATE_KT (   ht,
  k,
  e,
  t,
  f,
  b 
)
Value:
for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
{ \
for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
{ \
k &e = (ht).enumkey(ec); \
t &f = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
b; \
} \
}

◆ HTFIND

#define HTFIND (   success,
  fail 
)
Value:
uint h = hthash(key)&(this->size-1); \
for(chain *c = this->chains[h]; c; c = c->next) \
{ \
if(htcmp(key, H::getkey(c->elem))) \
{ \
return success H::getdata(c->elem); \
} \
} \
return (fail);

◆ insertionsort()

template<class T , class F >
void insertionsort ( T *  start,
T *  end,
F  fun 
)
inline

Specializable insertion sort for a pointer-delineated range.

Implements a insertion sort of elements between pointers start and end. The pointers start and end must correspond to a contiguous block of elements with type T.

Template Parameters
TThe type of object to be comparing
FThe comparison object
Parameters
startthe address to start from
endthe address to end at
funthe function object to compare

◆ quicksort()

template<class T , class F >
void quicksort ( T *  start,
T *  end,
F  fun 
)
inline

Specializable quicksort for a pointer-delineated range.

Implements a quicksort of elements between pointers start and end. The pointers start and end must correspond to a contiguous block of elements with type T.

Template Parameters
TThe type of object to be comparing
FThe comparison object
Parameters
startthe address to start from
endthe address to end at
funthe function object to compare
